basics.name: Miodrag Vasić
basics.label: Software developer
basics.summary: I’ve graduated in Computer science and IT at University of Niš, Faculty of electronics in 1996. Since graduating, I have worked on many positions as a Software developer and IT professional often simultaneously what I found one of my major advantages.Here are details about concrete areas of my work:  -	Object oriented programming (Visual Studio - C#.NET – ASP.NET MVC 5, Lambda expressions and LINQ,  EntitiyFramework 6, Design Paterns) & SQL Databases for desktop Client/Server or Web applications, Windows Azure cloud solution,  -	Web technologies for frontend programming (HTML 5, CSS 3, JavaScript, jQuery, Bootstrap, ...) -	MS SQL Server DB Design, progrmming, maintenance and administrating, -	ERP systems based on MS SQL Sever (manufacturing, purchasing, sales, accounting, inventory 	management, salary etc.) implementing - Programming and Database design, setting-up and 	maintenance, Reporting Service,  BI, etc.
